name: JOYCommunity
0:
”Alexa, open joy community”
”Alexa, ask joy community for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start joy community”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: joy community
des:
Experience JOY Community - The Movement Services on all your Alexa enabled devices. 
Visit JOYCommunity.org to experience more! 

Always Relevant | Always Alive

JOY Community is a community of people who love to celebrate the Joy of the Lord. 


You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
